entry.Sun: When it’s in trouble, its eyes moisten and begin to shine. The shining light attracts its comrades, and they stand together against their enemies.
entry.Moon: It’s awfully weak and notably tasty, so everyone is always out to get it. As it happens, anyone trying to bully it receives a painful lesson.

SunMoon: Route 7, 8, 9, 13, 14, 15, Melemele Sea, Kala'e Bay, Brooklet Hill, Secluded Shore, Tapu Village
